attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe that the government and the prime minister take no interest in the views of the people that are expressed through this website. Therefore I believe this website to be a waste of tax payers time and money. If 1/33  of the population (6% of the driving population) can sign a petition about road pricing and all they get in responce is a letter politely saying we will talk about it later, most people know this new way of scamming money out of people will be forced through whatever the opinions of the masses are.

rejection.details: Please direct any comments to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
